wikipedia_page.main: George Crabbie was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped once for Scotland in 1904. He also played for Edinburgh Academicals.He was the brother of John Crabbie who was also capped for Scotland.

response: He was the brother of George Crabbie who was also capped for Scotland.
